doc:
André Charpak https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andr%C3%A9_Charpak 0 André Charpak (4 September 1928 – 23 June 2006) was a Polish-French actor, dialoguist, film director and screenwriter. A brother of the physicist Georges Charpak he was an alumnus of the prestigious lycée Henri-IV. André_Charpak ( 4_September_1928 – 23_June_2006 ) was a_Polish-French_actor , dialoguist , film_director_and_screenwriter . A_brother of the_physicist_Georges_Charpak he was an_alumnus of the_prestigious_lycée_Henri-IV .
